content.name: Vanilla Icons Replacer
content.description:
[h1]Vanilla Icons Replacer[/h1] [b]X4 Foundations 3.0 Update Ready[/b] [b]X4 Split DLC Ready[/b] Inspired by X:Rebirth Icon mod, this mod replaces the ships and some stations in the galaxy map with Custom X:Rebirth and hand curated and design's that I have created.
[list] [*] Various Ship Roles now have Role exclusive icons to represent them, no longer is every ship just a triangle anymore! [i]Bomber, heavy-fighter, scout, frigate, destroyer, carrier, re-supply, you name it all classes have stylised icon[/i]
[*]Faction Exclusives. Xen and Khak have totally unique icon themes to represent them! [i]Other factions still use standardised design.[/i]
[*]Icons are sized to match their class no two classes are exactly the same size on the map.
[h2]Compatibility[/h2] [b]This version does NOT require VRO, if that is what you are after use the version below[/b] https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2007185841
content.author: Misunderstood Wookiee
